reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying unique room types (kitchen, bathroom, balcony, bedroom) first, and then differentiating between similar views of the same room type (living areas, kitchen views, bathroom views). Descriptions 6/7 and 8/9 were identified as different angles of the same physical space. The three living areas (Desc_1, 2, 3) were distinguished by the presence and prominence of windows: Desc_1 matched the internal view (Image_1) lacking a large window, while Desc_2 and Desc_3 were assigned to the two slightly different perspectives of the windowed living area (Image_2 and Image_3), based on the specific emphasis on 'window area' (Desc_2/Image_2) versus 'large living room potential' (Desc_3/Image_3). Bedrooms (Desc_4, 5) were matched based on perceived size and layout regularity.

matching_result_list.evidence: Matches the description of a main living/dining area focused on internal flow ('動線順暢') with no large external window visible in the primary view ('采光一般').
Matches the '客廳/餐廳帶窗區' (Living/Dining with window area) description, showing a large window and emphasizing sufficient lighting ('燈光充足').
Matches the '客廳/多功能區' description, providing a wide view suitable for planning a '大型客廳' (large living room) and showing the window recess suitable for a desk/daybed.

tag_list: 靠窗位置可做書桌/臥榻

matching_result_list.evidence: Identified as the primary, '方正臥室' (Square bedroom) with a standard large window.
Identified as the '中小型臥室' (Small/medium bedroom), suitable for a study or guest room, featuring a corner window placement.
Matches the '浴室一' description: fully renovated, wet/dry non-separated, and clearly shows the '雙地排' (double floor drain) and shower area.
Matches the '浴室二(同一衛浴不同角度)' description, providing a frontal view of the sink, mirror cabinet, and toilet, confirming the fixtures and layout.

matching_result_list.evidence: Matches the general '廚房' description, showing the long countertop ('流理台操作檯面長') and the external window from an angled perspective.
Matches the '廚房正面' description, providing a clear frontal view of the '一字型廚具配置' (I-shaped layout) and the upper/lower storage cabinets.
Perfect match for '狹長型工作陽台' (narrow/long utility balcony) and '有鐵窗防護' (protected by iron bars/grills).
